p: Significant (α 0.05) decrease was observed in the activities of GPx, glutathione S-transferase (GST), and SOD in the hepatic post-mitochondrial fractions of the diabetic rats compared with the control group. There was significant (α 0.05) increase in the activities of antioxidant enzymes in the MLEMC and glibenclamide treated rats compared with the diabetic non-treated group ( Table-4).
